spells.name: Echolocation
spells.description: Sonic sense gives you blindsight 40 ft.

spells.name: Monstrous Physique II
spells.description: Take the form and some of the powers of a Tiny or Large monstrous humanoid.

spells.name: Touch of Slime
spells.description: Touch infests a target with green slime.

spells.name: Vermin Shape I
spells.description: Take the form and some of the powers of a Small or Medium vermin.

spells.name: Vitriolic Mist
spells.description: As fire shield, except acid damage.
